column1: Reggina Calcio owns The Stadio Oreste Granillo which was named after a former president.
Parma F.C. owns Stadio Ennio Tardini which was named after a former president.
ACF Fiorentina owns Stadio Artemio Franchi which was named after a former president.
A.C. Siena owns Stadio Artemio Franchi which was named after a former president.
Calcio Catania owns Stadio Angelo Massimino  which was named after a former president.
